flow-definition.description:
1. save confige to database and return test id
2. save to database the suite csv content
3. update script number to database
4. get suite full path
5. run Auto deploy sanity

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: TestSuite
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description:
full installation suite choose
A700 Autorun_XYS_Suite_ATE
A600 Autorun_XYS_Suite_ATE_A600
TL AROL_Autorun_ATE_Suite

secureScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

secureFallbackScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Auto_Deploy_Sanity
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: when false will not run restore and silent installtion

secureScript.script:
switch (ToolType) { case 'Archer700': return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"17.11.00.21200_A700_Nunit_Image\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">" break case 'Archer600': return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"17.02.01.30100_A600_Mil_Nunit_Image\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">" break case 'Archer TL': return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"17.03.00.30400_TL_Mil_Nunit_Image\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">" break case 'A500': return "" break
break }
